name: FA Blood Orange [Blood 'Sicle] (FlavorBook Entry Recipe)
description:
Recipe Made for (FA) Blood Orange FlavorBook Entry
A Simple Blood Orange Creamsicle that's DAAP Free
-> http://diyordievaping.com/2017/04/25/fa-blood-orange/
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: Awesome mix. Spot on for the flavor of an orange popsicle. I took some tahity Lime Cold Pressed and Key lime and plugged them into this recipe, ...subbing out the orange(s)... So far steeping out to lime popsicle. Maybe some Koolada??? Totally 5 stars, ...6 in the heat!!!
This is amazing!  Definitely hits the profile.  I am going to need to mix another batch.  Delicious.
